summary: At the dawn of the 20th century, a sinister criminal organization has plotted against Chinese imperial family. Someone must stop them. Someone who is skillful in martial arts.
cast: Andy Lau|Michelle Reis|Willie Chi|Simon Yam|Chia-Liang Liu|Adam Cheng|Chia-Hui Liu|Ka-Kui Ho|Giorgio Pasotti|Bradley James Allan
title: Jui kuen III
